summary: 7-Eleven is a big convenience store chain started in Texas in 1927. It was originally called Southland Ice Company and later Tote'm Stores. In 1946, it became 7-Eleven because the stores were open from 7 am to 11 pm. A Japanese company, Ito-Yokado, bought 7-Eleven in 1991 and made it a fully owned subsidiary in 2005. Now, 7-Eleven has over 84,000 stores in 19 countries, selling food, drinks, and other items. It also runs stores under the Speedway and Stripes names in the U.S.
title: 7-Eleven
